greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 1 of Inverse partition triangle A038498.
program: (PARI) tp(n, k) = if (n<1, 0, if (k<1, 0, if (k == n, 1, if (k > n, 0, tp(n-1, k-1) + tp(n-k, k)))));
lista(nn) = {my(mtp = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, tp(n, k)), mtpi = mtp^(-1)); vector(nn, k, mtpi[k, 1]);}  \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 27 2021
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
ext: a(60) onward corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 26 2021
